concept.title: The Object Browser
concept.shortdesc: View or delete objects stored in using the Object Browser.

conbody.p: The Object Browser lets you view individual objects that have been stored in PHEMI Central. You can see the metadata that has been applied to the object, the data elements (if any) that were derived by running a DPF on the ingested data, and the binary data that makes up the object, shown as hexadecimal and ASCII.
Only a can access the Object Browser. As for all other data, access to data is governed by administrator access to data is restricted by the governance placed around the data.
